org.agorava.spi

Class ProviderApiService

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.agorava.spi.ProviderApiService

  • public abstract class ProviderApiService
extends Object
    Abstract base class for all Provider high level REST API calls.

    Concrete class must implement some or API of the remote service

    Author:
    Antoine Sabot-Durand

        key - param name

      • buildUri

        protected String buildUri(String uri,
              Map<String,? extends Object> parameters)
        Build an URI with multiple parameters coming from a Map
        Parameters:
        uri - base url
        parameters - map containing parameters
        Returns:
        absolute uri to perform call to remote service API

      • buildAbsoluteUri

        protected String buildAbsoluteUri(String uri)
        Build an URI. This method should be overridden to build complete URI from relative URI By default it returns the value in parameter to work with absolute uri
        Parameters:
        uri - to transform in absolute version
        Returns:
        absolute URI

      • getService

        protected abstract OAuthService getService()
        Returns:
        the underlying service to communicate with Provider Service

      • getSession

        protected OAuthSession getSession()
        Returns:
        the current user session
